title: 服务器报错
author: ejoke
txt_content:
会造成服务器延迟?这些30.04 16:30:10 [服务器] 信息 io.netty.handler.timeout.ReadTimeoutException30.04 16:30:10 [服务器] Netty Epoll Server IO #55/警告 [io.netty.channel.DefaultChannelPipeline]: An exception was thrown by a user handler's exceptionCaught() method while handling the following exception:

replies.author: ejoke
replies.txt_content:
a229596451 发表于 2017-4-30 20:58
服务端核心文件缺失
大佬请给个解决方案啊，方向也行，这样也可以自行摸索
是否和forge版本与sponge版本不一有关，或者是library文件不足?
